Text.Value: |And the Ironhands grenades. Speaking of I have a barrel of Rune Powder if you'd like. End of Baldur's gate seems appropriate time to use such quantities of the precious|
|There are more of us inside.|
|I'll pass. Trying to keep a low profile going in. Thanks though|
|There are more of us inside.|
|Your loss. You could have wielded the power to level mountains|
|Fantastic! Here's the Barrel. Just be sure to be clear when it goes off.|
